chunk:
Biore Gentle & Breathable Acne Prone Cleanser

Brand: Bioré

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER, GLYCERIN, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, HYDROXYPROPYL STARCH PHOSPHATE, OCTYLDODECYL MYRISTATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, LAURETH-4 CARBOXYLIC ACID, PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, LACTIC ACID, TETRASODIUM GLUTAMATE DIACETATE, PROPYLENE

ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, LAURETH-4 CARBOXYLIC ACID, PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, LACTIC ACID, TETRASODIUM GLUTAMATE DIACETATE, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, EUCALYPTUS GLOBULUS LEAF EXTRACT, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) FLOWER EXTRACT, SALIX ALBA (WILLOW) BARK EXTRACT, SODIUM BENZOATE
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
